entry.title: Conference: IMS-ICSDS 2025
entry.summary: I am glad to present a talk entitled Incremental Causal Effects for Time to Treatment at the 2025 IMS International Conference on Statistics and Data Science, Seville, Spain.

entry.title: Receive Graduate and Professional Student Association Travel Grant Award

link.title: Receive Graduate and Professional Student Association Travel Grant Award

entry.summary: I am pleased to receive the Graduate and Professional Student Association Travel Grant Award, which supports my conference travel in December 2025. I sincerely thank the Graduate and Professional Student Association at the University of California, San Diego, for their support.

entry.title: Conference: 2025 Annual Public Health Research Day

link.title: Conference: 2025 Annual Public Health Research Day

entry.summary: I am glad to present my poster entitled Incremental Causal Effects for Time to Treatment at the Herbert Wertheim School of Public Health and Human Longevity Science’s 2025 Annual Public Health Research Day, San Diego.

entry.title: Paper Accepted: Incremental Causal Effect for Time to Treatment Initialization

link.title: Paper Accepted: Incremental Causal Effect for Time to Treatment Initialization

entry.summary: This paper is published as a conference paper at the Thirteenth International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR 2025), Singapore. My collaborator, Andrew Ying, presented a poster entitled Incremental Causal Effect for Time to Treatment Initialization at ICLR 2025, Singapore.
